title: hacked acc
body:
hello i tried get support from riot writing support message ,but they don,t give me anwser.. 
some one hacked my acc and changed email but not the game password he,s using my acc to troll games blame others..
is there a way how can i get my acc back.i rly would like to get my acc back because i use it since season 2 and it,s rly good acc.
any advices?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and see there are currently a few tickets open on this.  Your ticket has been escalated to be reviewed by our account recovery team, but continuing to create or reply to tickets before a response will cause delay.  In the meantime, you can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to see if that may help with recovery at all.  It can take a bit depending  on the size of the queue, but hang tight.  You'll be in good hands, and we'll respond as soon as we can!
